thread.section_title: Reuters: Financial Services and Real Estate
thread.title: Kenya's top prosecutor says will examine banks' role in graft probe

title: Kenya's top prosecutor says will examine banks' role in graft probe
text:
May 28, 2018 / 12:53 PM / Updated 18 minutes ago Kenya's top prosecutor says will examine banks' role in graft probe Reuters Staff 1 Min Read
NAIROBI, May 28 (Reuters) - Kenyaâ€™s chief prosecutor said on Monday that he will examine the alleged role of banks in facilitating a nearly $100 million suspected corruption scam involving a government agency and companies.
Noordin Mohamed Haji told a news conference that he had charged 40 civil servants and 14 private sector officials in what he called the first stage of an ongoing corruption probe. (Reporting by Maggie Fick Editing by Catherine Evans)
